Text: Thanks MG as always. Sad to hear you're retiring. Hope we can find someone as dedicated as you to pick up where you left off.
Oh well. Thanks for all you've done Goose. Guess I'm gonna have to listen live now. Or I will have to. *hoping somebody fills your big shoes*

Goose, if you can give me an email address (just a made up gmail one is probably best, since posting an address here is an invite for spam!), I have some questions about how to easily capture/remove commercials/up. 

I wouldn't mind trying to throw the episodes online...but I don't have the slightest clue how to do it! 

Or, an even more anonymous way... could you just put the instructions in a notepad file and up it as a torrent/piggyback it with the next episode?

Thanks!

D: Awe. I'll miss you, goosie! I'm sure someone will pick up the reigns, but its sad to hear of you planning to go. I always appreciate every thing you upload for our small group of piratebay torrenters. c:
